headline: S&P Global forecasts annual profit above estimates on strong demand
summary: S&P Global now expects its 2025 adjusted earnings per share to be between $17.00 and $17.25, compared with its prior estimate of $16.75 to $17.25.  The company reported an adjusted profit of $1.36 billion, or $4.43 per share, in the second quarter ended June.  Analysts had estimated an adjusted profit of $4.22 per share, according to data compiled by LSEG.

headline: Arcos Dorados Achieves Full Investment Grade With S&P's Initial Rating of 'BBB-'
summary: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, July 31, 2025--Arcos Dorados Holdings Inc. (NYSE: ARCO) ("Arcos Dorados" or the "Company") announced that S&P Global Ratings (S&P) assigned an investment grade long-term issuer credit rating of ‘BBB-’ with a Stable Outlook for the Company. This marks the second investment grade rating received by Arcos Dorados, following Fitch Ratings’ upgrade to ‘BBB-’ in January 2025, thereby achieving full investment grade status.

raw.headline: Arcos Dorados Achieves Full Investment Grade With S&P's Initial Rating of 'BBB-'
raw.summary: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, July 31, 2025--Arcos Dorados Holdings Inc. (NYSE: ARCO) ("Arcos Dorados" or the "Company") announced that S&P Global Ratings (S&P) assigned an investment grade long-term issuer credit rating of ‘BBB-’ with a Stable Outlook for the Company. This marks the second investment grade rating received by Arcos Dorados, following Fitch Ratings’ upgrade to ‘BBB-’ in January 2025, thereby achieving full investment grade status.

headline: Bill Eager Appointed President of S&P Global Mobility and CEO Designate of Planned Standalone Public Company
summary: S&P Global (NYSE: SPGI) today announced the appointment of Bill Eager, Chief Executive Officer of CARFAX, as President of S&P Global Mobility ("Mobility"), effective August 15, 2025, and CEO designate upon completion of the previously announced planned separation of Mobility into a standalone public company. Mr. Eager succeeds Edouard Tavernier, who will remain with the Company as a strategic advisor through September 30, 2025, to support a smooth transition.

Mr. Eager succeeds Edouard Tavernier, who will remain with the Company as a strategic advisor through September 30, 2025, to support a smooth transition.

headline: S&P Global: Q2 Earnings Snapshot
summary: NEW YORK (AP) — S&P Global Inc. SPGI) on Thursday reported second-quarter net income of $1.07 billion. On a per-share basis, the New York-based company said it had net income of $3.50.
